name: Stellar Shift - Demo
description:
Free Demo! Project is no longer in development

Stellar Shift is a fast paced first person shooter with short 3 – 5 minute rounds, where time slows down around you the closer you are to enemy bullets. This allows you to dodge these bullets and retaliate with your own.

  • Website
  • Facebook
How to play
  • Right trigger: Shoot
  • Left thumb-stick: Run
  • Right thumb-stick: Aim
  • D-pad: Sensitivity
  • A: Jump
  • Y: Invert Controls
Controllers required.
